comments:
Build ID: tptpaide-2007-04-12-05-00-01

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Create a new Capability i,e new_file.mcap
2.Come to Properties tab and import the properties using Import Properties button, from XSD file
3.Select any of the imported property and click on the Edit Metadata button, so that "Edit Property Definition" Screen comes up
4.Add Default Property value i,e "Defaultvalue1" or "1234" using Add Default button and Click OK button to save the Metadata (Here one more problem is i am able to Enter and save Text as Default Property value)
5. Save the capability editor and Close the editor
6. Reopen the capability editor, come to the Properties tab   and Maximize the Imported property, error throws up

Created an attachment (id=70094)
patch for the defect 182307

As the FeatureMap can contain object of any class, there was a ClassCastException when trying to cast it to AnyType. So for all other objects other than AnyType objects, the class name is displayed.

patch for the defect 182307
Deferring to future because it depends on 179713 and is not a blocking issue for 4.4.
